name: Tibanna Gas Miner
Lore: 'Long-time Cloud City resident Willow Hood. Employed by a mining company which is sympathetic to the Rebels and sells them Tibanna gas at a discount.',
Text: 'When at a site, adds 1 to your Force drains at related cloud sectors. Also, during your activate phase, if at a Cloud City site and you control Bespin: Cloud City, may cumulatively activate 1 Force for every cloud sector on Bespin.',
